member.name: T:SwanCity.Converters.NullToBoolConverter
member.summary: Converts null values to boolean, with optional inversion

member.name: M:SwanCity.Converters.NullToBoolConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value to boolean based on null check
member.param: Optional parameter to invert the result ("true" to invert)
member.returns: True if value is not null, false if null (or inverted based on parameter)

member.name: M:SwanCity.Converters.NullToBoolConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Not implemented as this is a one-way converter

member.name: T:SwanCity.Resource
member.summary: Android Resource Designer class. Exposes the Android Resource designer assembly into the project Namespace.
